options-dropdown.fieldDescription: Please select the type of the link to be created. (Default to noraml link)
options-dropdown.name: ./link1/option

url-path.fieldDescription: If it is a AAA App URL, please enter URL in the format-http://[Domain].[ClubName].aaa.com/home.html
url-path.name: ./link1/urlPath

querystringkeyselection.fieldDescription: Please select a key from list of commonly used query string keys
querystringkeyselection.name: ./link1/selectedQueryString

querystringkey.fieldDescription: Please enter custom Query String Key if the query string you want to author is not available in above dropdown, please note that it will affect site performance!
querystringkey.name: ./link1/queryStringKey

open-in-new-tab-flag.fieldDescription: Please check box if it has to open in new Tab
open-in-new-tab-flag.name: ./link1/openNewTabFlag

modal-popup.fieldDescription: Please make sure to enter a unique ID associated with each modal on page to identify it uniquely.
modal-popup.name: ./link1/linkmodal
